executable.title: Concat DWI Images
executable.description: This program will concatenate two DTI runs together.
executable.acknowledgements: Funding for this version of the GTRACT program was provided by NIH/NINDS R01NS050568-01A2S1
executable.contributor: This tool was developed by Vincent Magnotta and Greg Harris.

parameters.label: Input Parameters
parameters.description: Parameters for specifying the diffusion weighted imaging studies to run together

image.name: inputVolume
image.description: Required: input file containing the first diffusion weighted image
image.label: First Input Image Volume

boolean.name: ignoreOrigins
boolean.description: If image origins are different force all images to origin of first image

parameters.label: Output File
parameters.description: Output file from combining two diffusion weighted images

image.name: outputVolume
image.description: Required: name of output NRRD file containing the combined diffusion weighted images.
image.label: Output Image Volume

integer.name: numberOfThreads
integer.label: Number Of Threads
integer.description: Explicitly specify the maximum number of threads to use.
